SETTINGS.CutsceneTextColorFontHint: Hex Code of Color for Text
SETTINGS.CutsceneTextSubColorFontHint: Hex Code of Color for SubText
SETTINGS.CutsceneTextColorShadowHint: Hex Code of Color for Text Drop Shadow
SETTINGS.CutsceneTextSubColorShadowHint: Hex Code of Color for SubText Drop Shadow
SETTINGS.CutsceneTextTimerHint: Number of Seconds for the splash screen to stay active
SETTINGS.CutsceneTextSoundHint: Play this sound when the splashscreen is rendered
SETTINGS.CutsceneTextAnimationDurationHi: Number of seconds for animation to finish. Set this to 0 for no animation.
SETTINGS.CutsceneTextAnimationDelayHint: Number of miliseconds for animation to be delayed before starting.
SETTINGS.CutsceneTextLineTwoDelayHint: Number of miliseconds to wait after rendering first line.
SETTINGS.CutsceneTextLineThreeDelayHint: Number of miliseconds to wait after rendering second line.
SETTINGS.CutsceneTextFontHint: Add new fonts to foundry using the built in font tool to use differnt fonts.
SETTINGS.CutsceneTextFontSizeHint: Any css value that is valid for font-size property.  Please use `# px` if using a specific value
SETTINGS.CutsceneTextSubFontSizeHint: Any css value that is valid for font-size property.  Please use `# px` If using a specific value
SETTINGS.CutsceneTextPermission.Title: Emit Splashscreen
SETTINGS.CutsceneTextPermission.TitleHin: Allow players with the selected role and above to send a Splash Screen.
CutsceneText.ErrorGM: Your account level is not permitted to use this command.
CutsceneText.ErrorCount: You may only display single overlay at time.
